author: AFP
title: Shahid Afridi announces international retirement
text:
Shahid Afridi announces international retirement Shahid Afridi announces international retirement Legendary Pakistan all-rounder Shahid Afridi today announced his retirement from international cricket, ending an illustrious and sometimes controversial 21-year career. By: AFP | Sharjah | Published: February 20, 2017 4:18 AM Legendary Pakistan all-rounder Shahid Afridi today announced his retirement from international cricket, ending an illustrious and sometimes controversial 21-year career. (Reuters) 
Legendary Pakistan all-rounder Shahid Afridi today announced his retirement from international cricket, ending an illustrious and sometimes controversial 21-year career. The 36-year-old star had already quit Test and ODI cricket but still skippered the Pakistan Twenty20 team at the 2016 world championships in India.

He stepped down as captain after the tournament but retained hopes of continuing his career in the sportâ€™s shortest format as a player. 
(Further inputs awaited)
